Comments_List: OS both basic and advanced knowledge.
Operating system and computer system organization knowledge, some networking and distributed computing knowledge and some database design and structure knowledge.
understand basic principles of operating systems.
theoretical knowledge of the operating system

Strength: I really like Avi's teaching style and how his course is arranged. I took an OS course last semester by Zhong Shao. As much as I thought this semester's course would be similar, Avi taught it in an extremely different perspective. Really inspiring.

Weakness: the slides are awful hahaha.
Weakness: should have more homework regarding the lectures
